title: Bring 'Em On In!
description:
Jeff Passan joins Buster to discuss Joey Votto’s 2,000th hit, how the Reds are tied to the Padres in the playoff race, San Diego signing Jake Arrieta, how things got ugly in a hurry for the Mets and if Trevor Bauer will pitch again in the majors. Then, Sarah Langs stops by to talk about Fernando Tatís Jr.’s 33 home runs in 88 games, Brandon Crawford’s slugging percentage and Luis Gil’s scoreless start to his career.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Jeff Passan on Joey Votto, the Padres being a weird team and Trevor Bauer. Plus, Sarah Langs has notes on Fernando Tatís Jr., Brandon Crawford, Luis Gil
